term.title: co-ions

item.text: Ions of low relative molecular mass with a charge of the same sign as that of a given colloidal ion. Source: PAC, 1972, 31, 577 (Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, AppendixII: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry) on page 607

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 607 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)

item.text: In an ion exchanger, mobile ionic species with a charge of the same sign as the fixed ions.
